__TOC__

The adm8211 is a Linux driver for the ADMtek wireless devices.  ADMtek is now owned by Infineon Technologies AG.

Linux drivers are available at <nowiki>[[http://aluminum.sourmilk.net/adm8211/|this site]]</nowiki>.

The driver supports the following (known) products:

* <nowiki>[[HardwareSupportComponentsWirelessNetworkCardsSmc|SMC 2635W]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[HardwareSupportComponentsWirelessNetworkCardsTrendnet|TRENDnet TEW-221PC]]</nowiki>

There is an <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/407853|open bug]]</nowiki> requesting that this driver be added to the Ubuntu kernel.

Sources:

http://www.seattlewireless.net/AdmTek
